00189 // bitshifts and masks for return value of scan function
00190 #define SCANRET_BITSHIFT_PROCESSED_ARGS  8
00191 #define SCANRET_BITSHIFT_OFFSET_LAST_ARG 0
00192 #define SCANRET_BITSHIFT_INDEX           16
00193 #define SCANRET_MASK_PROCESSED_ARGS      0x0000ff00
00194 #define SCANRET_MASK_OFFSET_LAST_ARG     0x000000ff
00195 #define SCANRET_MASK_INDEX               0x00ff0000
00196 #define SCANRET_INVAL_INDEX              0x000000ff
00197 
00198 #define SCANRET_GET_PROCESSED_ARGS ((x&SCANRET_MASK_PROCESSED_ARGS)>>SCANRET_BITSHIFT_PROCESSED_ARGS)
00199 #define SCANRET_GET_OFFSET_LAST_ARG ((x&SCANRET_MASK_OFFSET_LAST_ARG)>>SCANRET_BITSHIFT_OFFSET_LAST_ARG)

00571 #define ARGPROC_INDEX_BITSHIFT   0
00572 
00576 #define ARGPROC_INDEX_WIDTH     16
00577 
00581 #define ARGPROC_EXISTS_BITSHIFT 16
00582 
00586 #define ARGPROC_EXISTS_WIDTH     1
00587 
00592 #define ARGPROC_EXISTS(x) ((x>>ARGPROC_EXISTS_BITSHIFT)&((0x1<<ARGPROC_EXISTS_WIDTH)-1))
00593 
00598 #define ARGPROC_INDEX(x) ((x>>ARGPROC_INDEX_BITSHIFT)&((0x1<<ARGPROC_INDEX_WIDTH)-1))
